AI Description: LongQC is a quality control tool for long-read sequencing data, designed specifically for third-generation sequencing technologies like Pacific Biosciences (PacBio) and Oxford Nanopore Technologies. It aims to assess the quality of raw long-read sequencing data and provide users with detailed insights into the characteristics of the sequenced reads.
Core Features: Quality Assessment Of Long-Read Sequencing Data, Identification Of Sequencing Errors & Artifacts, Visualization Of Sequencing Metrics & Quality Scores, Detection Of Chimeric Reads & Adapter Sequences, Assessment Of Base-Call Accuracy & Read-Length Distribution
